website_summaries.verdict: Rectangular shape of these lenses is a classic and popular look for traditional Gucci sunglasses.
pros: Timeless design that looks great no matter what you're wearing
Nose bridge width should fit most faces well
Durable construction that will stand up to daily use
Frame contains lightweight material, so you can wear them for the entire day
cons: Extremely large style of sunglasses that won't fit the face of all people

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these beautiful glasses at Sunglass Hut in Hawaii and absolutely loved them! They were considerably more money ($295) than what I paid for here at Amazon. I love them, they are gorgeous, fit well and came nicely packaged with the certificates of authenticity.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Posey

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for all medium , small faces
customer_reviews.text: This product is suitbal for big round faces ... Its very wide , I had to adjust it so many times ... Also after couple of months the surface will come off from the handles .. Its a thin layer on the handles which will come off easily ... Other than these it looks good on the face
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: Was VERY pleased to receive them and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I made sure to check the measurements before purchasing sunglasses online. Was VERY pleased to receive them and they fit perfectly. Seller (frames spot) was amazing with shipping quickly and packaging. Very happy with purchase and the price! Thank you!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Zariii

customer_reviews.title: ♥️
customer_reviews.text: My favorite glasses ever! They were discontinued a couple of years ago and my original pair was damaged! So excited to find them again!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Purchase of Gucci sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant about purchasing sunglasses that I had not seen or been "fitted" for. I looked and looked at these, zooming in and out to get a better look, etc. But finally decided I would bite the bullet and just order them. Well, they showed up on the date as promised and they are absolutely gorgeous.The color combination is gorgeous and they fit like they were made for me. I am thrilled with them and will order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Owens

customer_reviews.title: Take care of them!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them till I realized it had a scratch on the lens, it was my fault not the actual glasses. They were classy, fun while they lasted!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Morales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them...they are perfect in everyway I get so many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Lovely glasses
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something fancy then this are the ones... the glasses are original and way more affordable than at a sunglass store. The only problem was that the case to store them came damage like if it was used.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: The sunglasses look very nice on, however
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses look very nice on, however, the way it fits leaves a long mark on both side of the nose, which I'm not thrilled about. Again, great looking on but disappointed on the marks when I take them off
customer_reviews.author: kemameal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking sunglasses but maybe too big for small faces
customer_reviews.author: Manal Youssef

customer_reviews.title: Gucci Girl
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunglasses! It looks just like the picture and the material is what I expected! I had to go to my Opt office to get it adjusted but that is it! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Gucci Women's Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: They far exceeded my expectations. They are beautiful and a perfect fit. I would definitely buy from this seller again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my aunt as a Christmas gift. She loved it and it looks great on her. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses. The fit is excellent. The color gradient is wonderful it gives the look of two colors, lavender and pink.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: and the glasses are just beautiful!! thank you
customer_reviews.text: product is just as advertised, came with everything. papers and all. and the glasses are just beautiful !! thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly like the one I saw in sunglasses hut, but there is some abrasions on the appearance
customer_reviews.text: I like this type of sunglasses, and it is just like the one I saw in sunglasses but much cheaper. That's really good. But the abrasions make it doesn't like a brand new one...I'm a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia_SSSSS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute just like i expected, and they look elegant too. Im very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bertha alicia rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Gucci Gone Girl
customer_reviews.text: I really was not thrilled after opening the box. I would have loved more pink coloring and a wider lens. The Gucci monogram on the side temples looked a tad bit cheap. The weight and design were nice however, I had to return to sender. I did find some Tods and Chloe sunnies on Smartbargains that are stunning! You can shop using your wonderful Amazon account.
customer_reviews.author: CattB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the same in sun glass hut. Love it I really recommend to buy it from here, save a lots
customer_reviews.author: Sakira

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are perfect if you are looking for a more square look. The sides of the glasses are not as thick as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses they are very cool and the color is perfect good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Elma

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Received this great sunglasses and impressed my girlfriend with this beautiful sunglasses that she's been seeking. Nice quality of the glasses and container they use to wrap the smoking sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: but these glasses were great. Came with the documentation to prove they were ...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the auto-review asked shoe questions, but these glasses were great. Came with the documentation to prove they were real and my wife is none the wiser I paid half of what Macy's wanted on sale.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new glasses and they arrived right on time!
customer_reviews.author: Zoya Avezbadalov

customer_reviews.title: Love it price perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this glasses I tried in in in sunglass hut and it fit my face perfect and loved it and I got it Amazon for a great price
customer_reviews.author: pearlann december

customer_reviews.title: Gucci GG3188/S is very good
customer_reviews.text: Gucci GG3188/S is very good. I will recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy1999

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I was looking At that sunglass at Macys where its 320 $, and I find it here at Amazon for 172. Well ,it's nice,but I'm not sure about his origin.I don't know what to think. Anyway,I will keep it,because I like the shape and the color and the price.Stiil not sure if it's real or fake.:)
customer_reviews.author: CSILLA KELEMEN

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and fit. Beautiful color, beautiful chocolate guccissimo case. Arrived in 2 days as advertised. Absolutely no issues or concerns thus far. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses is the second Gucci I have, I love the brown pink one, it looks great in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: hongyan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glasses
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't beleve to find this Gucci glasses at this price. Also, they are very confortable and have a clear view. I can wear them in the summer or winter. Glasses for every season. I love them completely.
customer_reviews.author: ida

customer_reviews.title: Glasses magnificence
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful product and the value of the acquisition is worth buying. Thanks for credibility in the presentations and images Valenzarat actually more beautiful than the pictures Recommend to buy
customer_reviews.author: abdualhakeem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shades!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Gucci shades. They match my Gucci White Fiat perfectly. Please buy them, you wont regret it. Definitely quality.
customer_reviews.author: bellaalways

customer_reviews.title: I love my GC3188/S!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Gucci 3188/S Sunglass! I was hesitant at first to order because why the price here is cheaper than others, almost half the price. So I thought its not authentic but I stand corrected. It is very authentic and very elegant! I got the Havana Frame/Brown Lens.. So Posh and so light! It fits me right. Got ample of compliments for this.. I bought a Prada sunglass but had to returned it as it was big and heavy for me. Then I saw this Gucci I fell in love with. I so love it love it! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jing

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sunglasses, unfortunately I had to send them back because of nasty scratch on one of the lenses. I am disappointed to pay good money for a damaged product. - sigh-
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: They look fantastic on me
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. They look fantastic on me, especially because of my strawberry hair color. Certificate of authenticity and everything. These are the read deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price, great product
customer_reviews.text: I received this product a week ago, and I'm just in love with this product, it's fits just right, better than I expected. The price is absolutely amazing for this product. I contacted a customer service, with the question and they helped me right away, so will recommend to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Nazerke

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very bad won't advice nobody to buy it..its not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kudzani tanyala

product_meta.title: Gucci Women's GUCCI 3188/S Rectangular Sunglasses
product_meta.description: $BRAND introduced modern $USAGE frames to the world. The materials used are of the highest quality. The styles are sleek and streamline. BROWN GRADIENT lenses give clear vision and complete protection to the eyes by blocking harmful rays and extreme light brightness.
